name: Beauty And The Beast
author: Gabrielle-Suzanne
review: The original animated Beauty And The Beast is one of my favorite Disney films.

name: The Secret History
author: Donna Tartt
review: Best novel I've ever read. It's interesting, entertaining and has a great ending.

name: Three Men in a Boat
author: Jerome K
review: Must read this one!! I will suggest you this, for a funny rib-tickling narrative by jerome K.

name: War and Peace
author: Leo Tolstoy
review: This book had me hooked from the first line on the first page. I'm going to read it again.

name: Devdas Bengali Novel
author: Sharat Chandra
review: By the time I was in the last few pages, there were tears in my eyes and for a reason.

name: The Devil in White City
author: Erik Larson
review: This book is fantastic! The thrilling elements are spot on! Thoroughly enjoyed reading it!
